configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"Connecting a billion people with calls, chats, and more","apkFilterRegEx":"\\/(?:.+_)?arm64(?:_.+)?\\.apk$","appName":"Weixin","autoApkFilterByArch":false,"intermediateLink":[{"customLinkFilterRegex":"\\/readtemplate\\?(?:[^#&]*&)*lang\\=zh_CN&(?:[^#&]*&)*t\\=page\\/faq\\/android\\/[0-9]{3,}\\/index&(?:[^#&]*&)*faq\\=android_[0-9]{3,}(?:[&#].*)?$","filterByLinkText":false,"reverseSort":true,"skipSort":true}],"invertAPKFilter":false,"matchGroupToUse":"$1$4.$2$5.$3$6","trackOnly":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":true,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\/weixin(?:(?:([0-9])([0-9])([0-9]))|(?:([0-9]+)([0-9])([0-9]{2})))android.*\\.apk$"}
